column4: ﻿rangua: just suggested that as i use a usb mouse that sometimes has issues when i boot, reconnecting it normally fixes it. dont know any more about usb cameras though
﻿RandyboY: well mplayer should just play any dvd you put in the drive, you do need to install the dvd decoder though as it's not open source
﻿rangua: I take it you installed libdvdcss2 in ubuntu?
ok how do in stall the dvd-decoder then? No just Add/Remove... ?
